description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended), in respect of the demolition of the existing buildings (with the exception of the Festival of Britain Buildings, Clock Tower and Idea Store), the provision of buildings ranging from 5 - 25 storeys (including ground floor), 746 new homes and up to 20,000sqm of non-residential floorspace. The non-residential floorspace would include provision of a refurbished Chrisp Street Market, refurbished Festival of Britain commercial units, additions to the existing idea store, a cinema, office space, retail space, financial and professional services, cafâ€š, takeaway and restaurant floorspace and a public house. New and refurbished public open space, cycle parking and up to 10 blue badge car parking space are also proposed.
